GSD.description:
dm integrity: fix memory corruption when tag_size is less than digest size

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.4 by commit 4d485cf9b609709e45d5113e6e2b1b01254b2fe9. For more details please see the references link.
